properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 12:07PM CST until January 11 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Wichita KS
properties.description:
...Winter Weather to impact the area this afternoon through
Saturday...

* WHAT...Heavy wintry mixed precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of
around a quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Marion and Chase Counties.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Saturday. Most of the precipitation will
occur this afternoon through about 4 AM Saturday. Mainly light
snow is expected during the day on Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Trees, power lines and elevated surfaces
will rapidly become ice covered.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST SATURDAY
